svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
May 18, 2024" date: "2024-05-18"
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade, small fork targeting late 2024
‚Ä¢ Dankrad Feist: benefits of Verkle , increase block size 10x, simplify node architecture, reduce sync
time, reduce node cost & enable path to light nodes
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
‚Ä¢ üö® Lido at 28.6% still too close to 33.3% threshold
üö® Lido at 28.6% still too close to 33.3% threshold
‚Ä¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~55% majority Lido 46.6% Geth at
end of Q1 Kiln went Geth free , 100% Nethermind Consensus layer: Prysm 37% Any client bug over 33.3%
‚Ä¢ Execution layer: Geth ~55% majority Lido 46.6% Geth at end of Q1 Kiln went Geth free , 100%
‚Ä¢ Lido 46.6% Geth at end of Q1
Lido 46.6% Geth at end of Q1
‚Ä¢ Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
‚Ä¢ Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
‚Ä¢ Data Always: timing games as a service viz
Data Always: timing games as a service viz
‚Ä¢ Piper Merriam: storing large SSZ objects in Portal Network to archive Ethereum‚Äôs state data
Piper Merriam: storing large SSZ objects in Portal Network to archive Ethereum‚Äôs state data
‚Ä¢ Nethermind (execution layer client) scaling roadmap via optimizations, Paprika, parallelization &
Nethermind (execution layer client) scaling roadmap via optimizations, Paprika, parallelization &
‚Ä¢ Consensus layer: Lodestar v1.18.1 : hotfix to disable flood publishing for local block builders with
‚Ä¢ Lodestar v1.18.1 : hotfix to disable flood publishing for local block builders with orphaned/missed
‚Ä¢ Execution layer: Besu v24.5.1 : snap sync server (early access) and receipt storage size reduced
Erigon v2.60.0 : last planned v2 release, fixes logs pruning issue in v2.59
‚Ä¢ Besu v24.5.1 : snap sync server (early access) and receipt storage size reduced
Besu v24.5.1 : snap sync server (early access) and receipt storage size reduced
‚Ä¢ Erigon v2.60.0 : last planned v2 release, fixes logs pruning issue in v2.59
‚Ä¢ Degen & Apex rollups stopped posting batches for more than 24 hours after config change, first
Degen & Apex rollups stopped posting batches for more than 24 hours after config change, first batches
‚Ä¢ User-defined penalties : proposal for preconf crypto-economic security
User-defined penalties : proposal for preconf crypto-economic security
‚Ä¢ EIPs: EIP7706 : Separate gas type for calldata EIP7707 : Incentivize access list provisioning
EIP7708 : ETH transfers emit a log
‚Ä¢ EIP7706 : Separate gas type for calldata
EIP7706 : Separate gas type for calldata
‚Ä¢ EIP7708 : ETH transfers emit a log
‚Ä¢ Hardhat v2.22.4 : adds BigInt task argument type
Hardhat v2.22.4 : adds BigInt task argument type
‚Ä¢ Guide to Hardhat Ignition deployment using Ledger
Guide to Hardhat Ignition deployment using Ledger
‚Ä¢ Heimdall-rs v0.8.0 : decompilation & decode improvements and more modular code base
Heimdall-rs v0.8.0 : decompilation & decode improvements and more modular code base
‚Ä¢ Betherscan (browser extension): adds data fields to Etherscan, including block header RLP, contract
storage root, EOA nonce and transaction signature (v, r, s)
Betherscan (browser extension): adds data fields to Etherscan, including block header RLP, contract
‚Ä¢ ERC5189 (account abstraction via endorsed operations) bundler : execute account abstraction
ERC5189 (account abstraction via endorsed operations) bundler : execute account abstraction
‚Ä¢ Vitalik: proposal for MACI with votes offchain by default
Vitalik: proposal for MACI with votes offchain by default
‚Ä¢ Sonne Finance (Compound v2 fork) ~$20M exploit on Optimism via known donation attack $6.5M saved
Sonne Finance (Compound v2 fork) ~$20M exploit on Optimism via known donation attack
‚Ä¢ Predy Finance ~$0.5M exploit on Arbitrum via a callback
Predy Finance ~$0.5M exploit on Arbitrum via a callback
‚Ä¢ Vitalik: improving permissionlessness & decentralization in short/mid term , MEV, liquid staking &
Vitalik: improving permissionlessness & decentralization in short/mid term , MEV, liquid staking &
‚Ä¢ Ethereum Protocol Fellowship cohort 5 applications open
Ethereum Protocol Fellowship cohort 5 applications open
‚Ä¢ EF Q1 grantees share $11M in funding
EF Q1 grantees share $11M in funding
‚Ä¢ Etherscan contract statistics of most called functions & language versions
Etherscan contract statistics of most called functions & language versions
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
‚Ä¢ Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 2.3 to 45.9 gwei, with 5.9 gwei average Zero net issuance
currently at 23.3 gwei 13k ETH net issuance this week
Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 2.3 to 45.9 gwei, with 5.9 gwei average
‚Ä¢ Zero net issuance currently at 23.3 gwei
Zero net issuance currently at 23.3 gwei
‚Ä¢ Rune: Dai endgame , NewStable (USD pegged with real world asset collateral) & PureDai (floating peg
Rune: Dai endgame , NewStable (USD pegged with real world asset collateral) & PureDai (floating peg
‚Ä¢ Words3 infinite live on Redstone, scrabble with fluctuating price letter tiles
Words3 infinite live on Redstone, scrabble with fluctuating price letter tiles
‚Ä¢ Tornado Cash developer Alex Pertsev sentenced to 64 months in prison for money laundering
Tornado Cash developer Alex Pertsev sentenced to 64 months in prison for money laundering
‚Ä¢ US Senate voted to repeal anti-crypto SEC Staff Accounting Bulletin 121 that precluded banks
US Senate voted to repeal anti-crypto SEC Staff Accounting Bulletin 121 that precluded banks offering
‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúLow carb crusader‚Äù brothers charged with wire fraud & conspiracy to commit money laundering
Reminder: MEV-Boost relay exploit on April 3, 2023 & low carb crusader disclosure
‚ÄúLow carb crusader‚Äù brothers charged with wire fraud & conspiracy to commit money laundering
‚Ä¢ Reminder: MEV-Boost relay exploit on April 3, 2023 & low carb crusader disclosure
‚Ä¢ P-256 hash-seed still hasn‚Äôt been found , RIP7212 secp256r1 precompile being added by rollups
P-256 hash-seed still hasn‚Äôt been found , RIP7212 secp256r1 precompile being added by rollups
‚Ä¢ RLN-v3 adds epoch-based message rate-limiting scheme
RLN-v3 adds epoch-based message rate-limiting scheme
END OF SERVICE: plan to deprecate Week in Ethereum News
Editor: @abcoathup Follow @WeekinEthNews for the most clicked links Permalink:
